author: holiman
content: I could regenerate it with PoW instead... ?

author: draganrakita
content: In my opinion it is not needed, if receipts in EIP-2930 are same as legacy, usage of  legacy receipts should be same as usage for eip2930. Either way we will have yolov3 as test to verify it.

author: sky.cactus
content: I'm not fully following the conversation, but keep in mind that receipts are typed as well, not just the transactions.

author: sky.cactus
content: IIRC, 2930 receipts are the same as legacy receipts other than the 2718 envelope around them, but that will change with EIP-1559.

author: draganrakita
content: Thanks Micah, I misread that receipts are same as legacy and it is written that Payload is same as legacy. Good that i didn't merge that change.

author: 0xraino
content:
If you want to use clique then I need to know how you write the difficulty in your header hash preimage. You might need to push up new files if "0x1" is the enshrined placeholder difficulty value. It looks like that's what we do.

Or put up new ones with ethash. (This is probably simpler)

author: holiman
content: I'll generate it as pow. Also, I'm updating our t8ntool so we can use it to generate official reference tests
